contactInformation.address: Steve Hyden, 74, New Road, Armitage, Nr. Rugeley, Staffordshire, WS15 4BJ

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet primarily functions as an election communication and contains a form for the recipient to fill out indicating their support and ways to get in touch with Steve Hyden. It also includes a photo of Steve Hyden with another individual, both holding campaign materials, but does not provide detailed information on policies, endorsements, or personal statements.
